rules.description: Replace Ctrl+6 -> Ctrl+^ in Terminal
Enable SandC (Space and Ctrl)
Enable RandS (Return and Shift)
Replace Capslock -> Ctrl + Alt
Send ctrl on space when used as modifiers
Send ctrl on lang1 when used as modifiers
Send ctrl on lang2 when used as modifiers
Send command/lang2 on left option
Send shift/lang1 on kana
Remap HHKB(JIS) to HHKB(US)
Send ctrl on space when used as modifiers
Send lang2 (japanese_eisuu) and escape on escape
Send lang2 (japanese_eisuu) and escape on Ctrl+[
Send shift/lang2 on left shift
Send shift/lang1 on right shift
Send lang2 (japanese_eisuu) and escape on escape
Send lang2 (japanese_eisuu) and escape on Ctrl+[
Send return_or_enter on Ctrl+M unless Terminal
Send delete_or_backspace on Ctrl+H unless Terminal
Send delete_forward on Ctrl+D unless Terminal
Send right_arrow on Ctrl+F unless Terminal
Send left_arrow on Ctrl+B unless Terminal
Send home on Ctrl+A unless Terminal
Send end on Ctrl+E unless Terminal
